title: Athenai
description: An ancient settlement located on the southern coast of the Black Sea. The subsequent modern village retained the ancient name until the 1920s, when it was given its current Turkish name Pazar (Zere province).

properties.description: 1:1 million scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 10180
